name: Magento Layered Navigation Filter
short_description:
Apptha’s Advanced Filters is a Magento extension which reduces the efforts of users in filtering down the products to find their desired one. This extension comes up with layered filter navigation which helps in filtering products based on various attributes including price, size, color, brand, category etc.
The AJAX filter mechanism throws the filter results instantly without loading the whole page, thereby saving time. Based on their findings, users can start filtering products based on any one parameter and keep on adding other product finder values if they need their filter to be more specific.
summary: Magento layered navigation filter extension for online shopping stores
